Package com.example.skipthegas

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AcceptRequestFragment
    This is a class which displays a fragment prompting a driver to accept a ride request
    CancelledRequestsFragment
    This fragment displays the rider's cancelled requests in list view
    CompletedRequestsFragment
    This fragment displays the rider's completed requests in list view
    CustomList
    This is a class which implements a custom list used with the Ride object to display relevant ride data
    DriverContactInfoFragment
    This class implements the dialog fragment that displays driver's contact info Invoked when the driver's username is clicked on in the YourRideRequestActivity class
    DriverDrawerActivity
    This is a class that implements the drawer style menu for the driver
    DriverDrawerActivityTest  
    DriverDrawerProfileFragment
    This is a fragment that is nested within the Driver's drawer menu It displays the driver's profile and relevant contact information
    DriverMapFragment
    Driver's map activity fragment, driver can view maps from this fragment
    DriverPaymentScannerActivity
    The class allows the driver to receive payment after ride completion Driver can receive payment by scanning the QR code on the rider's phone
    DriverProfileActivityTest  
    DriverProfileEditable
    This is a class that governs the editable view of the driver profile screen
    DriverRequestFragment
    This is a class that displays the active requests visible to the driver
    DriverTripProcessActivity
    This class displays the relevant information for the ride request that is currently being served by the driver Driver is able to confirm and complete the currently open ride from this activity
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    LogInActivity
    This is a class which allows the user to log into the app
    LogInActivityTest  
    MainActivity
    This is the main class which is launched when initially starting the app.
    MainActivityTest  
    MapsActivity
    This is a class that creates the map and sets the map view
    PaymentActivity
    This a class that governs the payment screen, where a QR code is generated for payment transfer
    Ride
    This is a class that stores and contains getter methods for all attributes of a request
    RiderDrawerActivity
    This class implements the drawer style menu for the rider
    RiderDrawerProfileFragment
    This fragment is accessed from within the Rider's drawer menu It displays the rider's profile information fetched from firebase
    RiderMapFragment
    Rider's map activity fragment Rider can view map from this fragment
    RiderProfileActivityTest  
    RiderProfileEditable
    This is a class that governs the editable view of the rider profile screen
    RiderRequestFragment
    This fragment displays the rider's requests Allows for selecton between completed and cancelled requests
    RiderTripProcessActivity  
    SelectionActivity
    This is a class that allows the login user to choose whether to be a rider or driver
    SignUpActivity
    This is a class that governs the sign up screen of the app
    SignUpActivityTest  
    TripFeedBackActivity
    This is a class that governs the trip feedback screen, which launches upon the completion of a trip and gives the rider an opportunity to rate the driver
    VerifyActivity
    This is a class that that verifies an email after registering
    YourRideRequestActivity
    This is a class which governs the rider's current ride request Allows riders to view details regarding the most recent ride request they submitted
